meanings.definition: Isolated hill or mountain rising abruptly from a plain
meanings.sent1: The inselbergs stood tall amidst the flat land.
meanings.sent2: We could see the inselbergs from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The inselbergs seemed like giants peeking out of the ground.
meanings.sent4: The inselbergs loomed over the horizon like ancient guardians.
meanings.sent5: The inselbergs cast long shadows in the setting sun, creating a dramatic landscape.

meanings.sent1: One inselbergs caught my eye as I hiked through the valley.
meanings.sent2: An inselbergs can be a striking feature in an otherwise flat area.
meanings.sent3: I found a tiny inselbergs in my pocket, a souvenir from the trip.
meanings.sent4: The inselbergs in the distance looked like a solitary sentinel.
meanings.sent5: The inselbergs in the painting stood out as the focal point of the artwork.

meanings.definition: Group of inselbergs in a particular area
meanings.sent1: The cluster of inselbergs created a unique landscape.
meanings.sent2: Tourists marveled at the group of inselbergs that dotted the region.
meanings.sent3: The inselbergs gathered together as if for a secret meeting.
meanings.sent4: The inselbergs huddled close, forming a natural fortress.
meanings.sent5: The group of inselbergs resembled a family of stone giants guarding the valley.
